title: Jumpers
description: Gypsy Lore. Fortune Telling. Black MagicTwelve million Gypsy’s in the world.They have the gift. Good fortune or destroy with a curse.Two men visit one. The wrong one. Money is exchanged. She looks into their eyes. A wish is granted!Sorcery!You’ll never drive over a bridge again without looking left, right…Jumpers!Jumpers is a 5000 word short story by thriller writer Norm Applegate, Into the Basement and First to Die.About the authorNorm Applegate is the author of four novels, and is best known for his horror thriller, Into the Basement.Cover art and design by James Rone.Jameron713@gmail.com
author: Norm Applegate
